description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Slow-Cooked Beef Roast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Slow-Cooked Beef Roast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove beef from oven, cover loosely with foil and rest for 30 minutes. Pull beef apart using two forks and transfer to a serving platter with yoghurt, mint, pomegranate arils and chilli. Serve with flatbread, drizzled with sauce.
